details.spack_dependencies: ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^openmpi@4.1.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openmpi@4.1.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^python@3.8.12/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' python@3.8.12 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
details.spack_spec: plumed@2.6.3 % gcc@10.2.0 +gsl +mpi +shared ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^openmpi@4.1.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openmpi@4.1.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^python@3.8.12/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' python@3.8.12 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
